newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures extend rally, trade brisk.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures extend rally, trade brisk.

text.p: May 8 - U.S. stock index futures were up sharply in brisk trading as bullish sentiment mounted. Traders said June S&P on track for fresh record high today. Old high set earlier this week at 838.40. "At the rate this stuff is going we'll make a new high today," one S&P 500 futures trader said. Strong Nasdaq, higher bonds help, traders said.
